HOME_PAGE.title: Hello Software – Modern Web & Mobile App Development
HOME_PAGE.caption: Digital products that scale with your business – websites, mobile apps, and cloud software.

metadata.title: Hello Software – Modern Web & Mobile App Development
metadata.description: Software House dealing with the creation of websites, mobile and web applications and provide complete technology support for your business.

HERO_SECTION.text: We’re an experienced software house delivering high-performance digital solutions tailored to your business needs. We create fast, modern websites, mobile applications for iOS & Android, and scalable e-commerce platforms – all optimized for performance and SEO. Looking for a reliable technology partner? Let’s build your next digital product together – get in touch with us today!

HOW_IT_WORK_SECTION.title: Our Development Process
HOW_IT_WORK_SECTION.caption: Discover each stage of our development workflow – from strategy and design to launch and optimization.We simplify complex processes to deliver efficient, scalable, and user-friendly software solutions.

steps.title: Strategy & UX Design
steps.description: Define the business goals, target audience, and key functionalities. Create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups to ensure an intuitive user experience and conversion-driven layout.

steps.title: Front-End & Back-End Development
steps.description: Transform the approved designs into a fast, responsive website using modern technologies like React and relevant frameworks. Implement scalable back-end architecture as needed.

steps.title: Quality Assurance & Launch
steps.description: Perform thorough testing for performance, responsiveness, SEO readiness, and security. Fix bugs, optimize loading speed, and deploy the website on a reliable server with analytics integration.

ABOUT_US.title: About Hello Software
ABOUT_US.caption: Learn more about Hello Software – our team, mission, and commitment to innovation.

metadata.title: About Us – Hello Software
metadata.description: Meet the team behind Hello Software – experts in web, mobile, and cloud development.

sections_1.title: Our Core Values
sections_1.caption: The foundation behind every successful project we deliver.
sections_1.text: At Hello Software, we are guided by values such as transparency, innovation, accountability, and commitment. We believe that only through honest, collaborative partnerships can we deliver top-quality software solutions that truly support the growth of our clients' businesses.

sections_2.title: Our Team Culture
sections_2.caption: Driven by passion, built on trust and mutual respect.
sections_2.text: We foster a work environment focused on teamwork, open communication, and continuous learning. Every team member at Hello Software has a real impact on both projects and the company. We promote a culture of feedback, flexibility, and work-life balance that fuels productivity and creativity.

sections_3.title: Our Vision
sections_3.caption: Modern technologies serving people and business growth.
sections_3.text: Our vision is to create intelligent, scalable, and accessible software solutions that meet the evolving needs of today’s digital world. We strive to be a trusted tech partner for businesses worldwide, enabling their digital transformation and helping them achieve their goals.

sections_4.title: Why Choose Us?
sections_4.caption: Your business goals in the hands of a skilled software team.
sections_4.text: Choosing Hello Software means partnering with a team that understands your needs and translates them into effective technology solutions. We combine experience, innovation, and transparency in everything we do. Each project is built on strategic analysis, a tailored plan, and the highest quality standards—from concept to deployment and beyond.

COOKIES_BANNER.title: Cookies
COOKIES_BANNER.caption: We use cookies to ensure the website works properly, analyze traffic, and personalize ads. Manage your preferences or accept all to enjoy the full website experience.

preferences.analytics: Analytics cookies (e.g. Google Analytics) – help us measure traffic and improve performance.
preferences.marketing: Marketing cookies (e.g. Google Ads, Facebook Ads) – used to show you relevant ads based on your interests.
